Title: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to meet President Trump today
Description:
President Trump says he is hopeful to reach a Gaza ceasefire deal this week.
In his meeting with Netanyahu, Trump could outline a plan for Gaza after 21 months of war between Israel and Hamas.

Title: Inside the evolution of Biosphere 2, from '90s punchline to scientific playground
Description:
The venture, privately funded to start, is now run by the University of Arizona.
And today, scientists there are quietly plugging away at research they hope will help us all adapt to the Biosphere 1 — that is Earth, and the climate change we are causing to it.
